newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Daewoo in $15 mln China express bus j/v.
newsitem.headline: Daewoo in $15 mln China express bus j/v.

text.p: Daewoo Corp, a unit of Daewoo Group, said on Tuesday it had agreed with Tianjin Long-distance Bus Co to set up a $15 million express bus joint venture in Tianjin, China.

The joint venture company, named Tianjin Jinwoo Transportation Co Ltd, would start operation in August with 50 deluxe express buses. The company would have a paid-in capital of $10 million and seek annual sales of $9 million.
The two companies would each have a 50 percent stake in the venture. --Seoul Newsroom (822) 727 5643
